metadata.title: CVE-2014-1921 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: parcimonie before 0.8.1, when using a large keyring, sleeps for the sameamount of time between fetches, which allows attackers to correlate keyfetches via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: parcimonie: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
